safetyTips: All staff trained in contactless delivery. No cash taken. Gloves, face masks, hand sanitiser and hand washing facilities are used in the shop when packing.
name: STAG COFFEE & GROCERIES
address: Stag Coffee, 110 High Street, Ashford, TN24 8SD
description: Stag Coffee is a coffee shop in the heart of Ashford. Now a grocery, fresh food home delivery company working with local producers. We deliver all the essentials and luxuries you could need. No minimum spend, delivered by professional drivers. Next day delivery for all Ashford orders placed by 4pm. Order online.
